subject: Serial install of Fedora 7
body:
Hi guys,
Anyone know how to do a serial install of Fedora 7 over a serial console?
I tried to use the boot.iso file and ran the serial option from the boot
prompt, but this didn't really work and I did not see any output on the
terminal.
Anyone know what I need to change?

Thanks,
Tom
